alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 29 at 2:11PM AKST until January 31 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 inches possible. Winds gusting to 35 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 50 below. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 50 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
